name: Fungotchi
description:
Fungotchi

Farm up some mushroom people!

Controls
  • Arrow keys to move cursor.
  • X to grab something or what you hold.
  • Z or C to poke something (interact with).
  • Enter to bring up pause menu
    • Continue to resume game.
    • Reset Cart to reload the game.
Latest Changes
  • 0.0.2
    • Jam prototype release
  • 0.0.1
    • Test version.
Credits

Code: Munro Hoberman (Twitter)

Cursor sprite based on Pico Checkmate

Made for #GBJAM 8 in a week!
